successes.title: RiffTrax Live 2015: THE ROOM, MIAMI CONNECTION, SHARKNADO 2!
successes.description: The MST3K guys are roasting THE ROOM, SHARKNADO 2, MIAMI CONNECTION + SANTA & THE ICE CREAM BUNNY for LIVE SHOWS in 700+ Movie Theaters

Pledges.description: THANK YOU PAGE. Your personal name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com! AND the satisfaction that you helped give THE ROOM, SHARKNADO 2, MIAMI CONNECTION & ICE CREAM BUNNY the riffing they deserve. ALSO as a Kickstarter backer at any level, we try to give exclusive perks during the year - like secret passwords for early access to Live Show tickets whenever possible including all the above shows from Nashville.

SHORTS COLLECTION - 2 NEVER-BEFORE-RIFFED SHORTS. Digital download of two never-before-riffed shorts made just for you our Kickstarter backers!. Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com!
SHORTS COLLECTION PLUS ONE. Everything at the $10 level plus a certificate for a digital download of ANY FULL-LENGTH RIFFTRAX MP3 of your choice, from our existing catalogue. SUPREME VALUE!!!

ICE CREAM BUNNY LIVE SHOW DOWNLOAD PACKAGE! Digital download of the SANTA AND THE ICE CREAM BUNNY RiffTrax Live Show performed in December. It will be delivered on the Ice Cream Bunny Digital Release Date (approximately 60 days after that Live Show.) Plus your name personally thanked on a special thank-you page at RiffTrax.com.
ICE CREAM BUNNY LIVE SHOW DOWNLOAD PACKAGE + SHORTS COLLECTION. Everything in the $20 level plus the SHORTS COLLECTION.

ICE CREAM BUNNY LIVE SHOW DOWNLOAD PACKAGE + SHORTS COLLECTION + EXTRA FULL-LENGTH RIFFTRAX OF YOUR CHOICE. Everything in the $25 reward level PLUS a certificate good for a digital download of ANY FULL-LENGTH RIFFTRAX MP3 of your choice, from our existing catalogue.

MIAMI CONNECTION ICE CREAM BUNNY SUPER PACKAGE!  Everything in the $30.00 reward package PLUS: you ALSO get a digital download of the RIFFTRAX LIVE: MIAMI CONNECTION show to be performed in October 2015!  Download will be delivered on the Miami Connection Digital Release Date (approximately 60 days after that Live Show.)

MIAMI CONNECTION ICE CREAM BUNNY SUPER PACKAGE + DIGITAL GOODIE PACK! Everything in the $45.00 reward package plus a digital goodie pack. Includes, at a minimum, cool stuff like a digital signed copy of a rehearsal script, digital live show avatars from artist Len Peralta, digital signed thank-you photo from Mike Nelson, Kevin Murphy, and Bill Corbett, plus more!

EVERYTHING FROM ABOVE + EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT. Everything in the $50 rewards package plus... RiffTrax Kickstarter Commemorative T-Shirt designed exclusively for our Kickstarter backers! This T-Shirt will not be available anywhere else.

INVITATION TO OUR PLANNING SESSION. Everything in the $75.00 reward package plus... an exclusive access code to watch an online planning session / rehearsal for the SHARKNADO 2 Live Show. A glimpse behind the curtain, if you dare. [NOTE: Most features of this reward would come post-shows in late 2015 and early 2016, but the planning session would be available by early July, before the Sharknado live show]

YOUR NAME ONSCREEN. Everything in the $100.00 rewards package plus: YOUR name in the credits at the end of the Miami Connection RiffTrax Live show in October! IMMORTALITY is yours - especially since this Show will be available into eternity as a digital download! (Must have your name to RiffTrax no later than July 10th to be included - we'll email you with details after the kickstarter is over.)
SIGNED MIAMI CONNECTION POSTER! Everything in the $150 package PLUS an Official RiffTrax Live: Miami Connection full size poster autographed by Mike, Kevin and Bill!

YOUR FACE ONSCREEN. Everything in the $175 rewards package plus... your name AND PHOTO at the end of the Miami Connection RiffTrax Live show in October. So much YOU! (Must have your approved name and photo to RiffTrax no later than July 10th to be included - we'll email you with details after the kickstarter is over.)

WRITE A RIFF FOR THE "THE ROOM" LIVE SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package PLUS you will get to write a riff for the THE  ROOM Live Show in May. We'll give you the scene and space for the joke, and you get to write your own comedy gold which will be performed by Mike, Kevin or Bill during the Live Show. You will even get a "Kickstarter Guest Writer" credit in the end credits of the show, and you will be mentored by the RiffTrax writers to make sure all goes smoothly. (Riff must be approved by RiffTrax.)

WRITE A RIFF FOR THE SHARKNADO 2 LIVE SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package PLUS you will get to write a riff for the SHARKNADO 2 Live Show in July. We'll give you the scene and space for the joke, and you get to write your own comedy gold which will be performed by Mike, Kevin or Bill during the Live Show. You will even get a "Kickstarter Guest Writer" credit in the end credits of the show, and you will be mentored by the RiffTrax writers to make sure all goes smoothly. (Riff must be approved by RiffTrax.)

WRITE A RIFF FOR THE MIAMI CONNECTION LIVE SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package PLUS you will get to write a riff for the MIAMI CONNECTION Live Show in October. We'll give you the scene and space for the joke, and you get to write your own comedy gold which will be performed by Mike, Kevin or Bill during the Live Show. You will even get a "Kickstarter Guest Writer" credit in the end credits of the show, and you will be mentored by the RiffTrax writers to make sure all goes smoothly. (Riff must be approved by RiffTrax.)

WRITE A RIFF FOR THE SANTA AND THE ICE CREAM BUNNY LIVE SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package PLUS you will get to write a riff for the SANTA AND THE ICE CREAM BUNNY Live Show in December. We'll give you the scene and space for the joke, and you get to write your own comedy gold which will be performed by Mike, Kevin or Bill during the Live Show. You will even get a "Kickstarter Guest Writer" credit in the end credits of the show, and you will be mentored by the RiffTrax writers to make sure all goes smoothly. (Riff must be approved by RiffTrax.)
GET MIKE NELSON'S SCRIPT FROM THE "THE ROOM" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Mike during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET KEVIN MURPHY'S SCRIPT FROM THE "THE ROOM" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Kevin during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET BILL CORBETT'S SCRIPT FROM THE "THE ROOM" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Bill during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET MIKE NELSON'S SCRIPT FROM THE "MIAMI CONNECTION" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Mike during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!

GET MIKE NELSON'S SCRIPT FROM THE "ICE CREAM BUNNY" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Mike during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET KEVIN MURPHY'S SCRIPT FROM THE "ICE CREAM BUNNY" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Kevin during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET BILL CORBETT'S SCRIPT FROM THE "ICE CREAM BUNNY" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Bill during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET MIKE NELSON'S SCRIPT FROM THE "SHARKNADO 2" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Mike during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET KEVIN MURPHY'S SCRIPT FROM THE "SHARKNADO 2" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Kevin during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!
GET BILL CORBETT'S SCRIPT FROM THE "SHARKNADO 2" SHOW! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: the actual script used by Bill during the Live Show, autographed to you personally!

SHARKNADO 2 VIP GUEST OF HONOR! Everything in the $250 rewards package plus: attend the SHARKNADO 2 Live Show in July as guest of RiffTrax! Tickets in the first 3 rows for you and a guest at the Belcourt Theater in Nashville. You will be onscreen and thanked personally during the show. Attend the rehearsal the day of the show, and get a personal "Happy Hour Meet & Greet" with Mike, Kevin and Bill the day before. Plus a Special RiffTrax Goodie Bag. [NOTE: must provide your own travel to and lodging in Nashville for a July 9th show.]
